example.parse: (SBARQ (CONJ لكن) (WHNP-2 (INTERROG_PRON ماذا)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (SBAR-PRD (SUB_CONJ لو) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM_POSS مديرو) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الشركات) (DET+ADJ_COMP الكبرى))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ مدفوعين) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعتماد) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اشكال) (ADJ اخرى)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصدق))))))))))) (PUNC ?))
